title: Drawing, "A Fortified Town Overlooking a Lake", 1800–25
medium: Black chalk on cream wove paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Paved road leads to town. Two sections visible at right angle to each other. Upper section bordered by wall and substructures.  At left, lake and mountains.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "A Fortified Town Overlooking a Lake", 1800–25.
1800–25. Black chalk on cream wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2439.
